name: Trogotronic Pulse Transducer
details:
e/1 Pulse Transducer Accessory for m/12 Detektore/1 Pulse Transducer is a tactile performance interface accessory for m/12 Detektor Quad-Envelope CV Generator (or any Envelope Generator with similar input specs). Patch to m/12 module pulse input jacks & e/1 responds intuitively to percussive input via fingers, percussion mallets—even a pair of pencils (using the erasers for contact). Ships with long Patch Cord.
https://trogotronic.com/product/e1/
